attributes.action: Stop taxing those earning under £25,000 per annum.
attributes.additional_details: The increases is set to bring a lot more depression, anxiety and difficult times ahead. This increase limits a lot of individuals from having a chance at a good life. We need a STOP to taxing those earning under £25,000 per annum.
attributes.background: With the new April minimum wage & increases in bills, contracts etc. Anyone earning under £25,000 per annum should not get TAXED.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure if you'd like the income tax and National Insurance threshold raised to £25,000 or for people earning less than this to be exempted from all taxation. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
